title: Partial Diff Eqns I
description: Method of characteristics for first- and second-order partial differential equations, conservation laws and shocks, classification of second-order systems and applications.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
